text: Yitzhak Hofi (; 25 January 1927 â€“ 15 September 2014) was an Israeli spy and general. He was a member of the Palmach. He was also the head of the Israeli Northern Command and the director of Mossad.Command and control Hofi died on 15 September 2014, aged 87. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Directors of Israeli intelligence agencies Category:Israeli generals Category:Mossad people Category:Military people from Tel Aviv
